plot: We are 3 friends and we put 3 candles on our heads and ran across the village green on New Years Eve. This village has been almost empty for many years and I'm sure no one has stepped on ...
title: 3 Freunde, 3 Kerzen, 1 mickriges Feuerwerk - Hallo 2008!
